title: Spacious One Bedroom Available NOW | Tour With US

show contact info
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 678 Sq.
Ft.
Comfort.
Luxury.
Atmosphere.
Centrally situated right in the heart of downtown Renton, Washington, Second and Main is the most elegant and convenient apartment community in the Renton area.
Our studio-, one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and lofts are meticulously designed with you in mind.
Second and Main’s highly-coveted location allows our community to easily enjoy the trendy lifestyle of downtown Renton.
We’re only a five-minute drive from The Landing and a stone’s throw away from downtown Seattle.
Ranked as a “Walker’s Paradise” by <URL>, you’ll have the finest that Renton has to offer at your doorstep.
Find everything from grocery stores, parks, and schools to bars, eateries, and entertainment, all within a half-mile of our location.
For our more active residents, we’re just steps away from the most gorgeous trails along the banks of Cedar River.
Contact our office today to schedule your own personal tour of Second and Main!
Features:

Studios, One, Two and Three Bedroom Flats and Lofts, Washer and Dryer in Each Home, Hardwood Style Flooring, Dishwasher, Black Appliances, Balcony or Patio, Garage Parking, Kitchen Bars, Refrigerator, Upgraded Cabinets (Modern Colors)
Community Amenities:

Easy Freeway Access, Fitness Studio, BBQ Area, Resident Services Including Package Acceptance and Online Payment Processing, Controlled Access, Quick Access to Seattle/Bellevue, Pet Friendly, Centrally Located Downtown Renton, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance On-Call Service, Smoke Free Building, Located Near Cedar River Trail, Cable/Satellite/Internet Ready, Close to Shopping, Future Retail Partner, Walkable to Several Amazing Eateries and Pubs, Resident Lounge, On-Site Recycling, Professionally Managed, Courtyard Lounge, Steps Away from Library, Transit Center Accessibility
Pet Policy
We accept cats and dogs.
2 pets allowed per home.
Dogs must weigh below 75 pounds at full grown weight.
A $250 pet fee and $250 pet deposit are required for each pet.
Monthly pet fees apply, please call for details.
Our pet-friendly apartments welcome most breeds of dogs.
However, because certain dogs do not thrive in a community environment, we do have breed restrictions.
Please contact us for details.
